posts.post_content:
Hello,

I have a variety of T206 - related (sort of) and other coupons.  Specific to T206 are Piedmont (white & pink), Sweet Caporal and Polar Bear. 

These are small coupons, the Polar Bear measuring 3 x 2, the Piedmont and Sweet Caporal 2.5 x 1.5. 

Other names available are Recruit, Fatima, Turkish Trophies, Murad, Mecca, Miner’s Extra and Egyptienne Straights.  

I have the T206-related priced as follows:

Polar Bear - $10
Piedmont Pink - $10
Piedmont White - $7
Sweet Caporal - $7

Please email me with any questions. 
[url]Craigdiamondt3@yahoo.com[/url]
Very cool stuff - thanks for sharing with us
